title: Ticket #1466: shadow recycling fails after running 255 jobs
description:
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=604986

The Red Hat QA team found that the shadow crashes after a while when shadow recycling is turned on. 

06/17 04:11:27 (32.250) (6961): ERROR "# of command handlers exceeded specified maximum" at line 893 in file daemon_core.cpp

The problem appears to be that DaemonCore's Cancel_Command does not decrement the number of registered commands.
check_ins: 2010-Jun-17 14:12   Check-in [18494]: Fixed DaemonCore's Cancel_Command to decrement the count of registered commands, #1466 (By Matthew Farrellee )
